text: Aferim! () is a 2015 Romanian Czech Bulgarian French western drama movie directed by Radu Jude and starring Victor Rebengiuc, Luminița Gheorghiu, Șerban Pavlu, Gabriel Spahiu, Teodor Corban. ==Other websites== * Category:2015 drama movies Category:2010s Western (genre) movies Category:Romanian drama movies Category:Czech drama movies Category:Bulgarian movies Category:French drama movies Category:French Western (genre) movies Category:Movies directed by Radu Jude
title: Aferim!
